body.name: Sakugi Over Sink Dish Drying Rack - Adjustable 23.6-35", Space-Saving 2-Tier Stainless Steel Rack for Kitchen Counter, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 47 mins
features: LARGE CAPACITY: Sakugi over-sink dish drying rack features an extra large capacity that can store various tableware and cleaning supplies, such as bowls, dishes, knives, wine glasses, cutting boards, sponges, brushes, and more. Just one dish rack is capable enough to organize your countertop orderly.

ADJUSTABLE DESIGN: You can rest assured that Sakugi dish drying rack fits almost all sizes of household sinks. This practical dish drainer for kitchen counter can be freely adjusted from 23.6'' to 35.0'' according to your needs. (Note: For a better fit, please make sure the width of your sink is less than 35.0" and the height of the faucet is less than 21".)

DURABLE MATERIAL & EFFICIENT DRAINAGE: Made of premium 304 stainless steel, this drying dish rack for kitchen counter is durable for long-term use without rust and corrosion. Besides, its over-the-sink design enables this 2-tier dish drying rack to drain water directly into the sink, not onto the countertop, effectively avoiding water pooling.

SIMPLE INSTALLATION & EASY TO CLEAN: With step-by-step instructions and elaborate illustrations, Sakugi kitchen dish drying rack is easy to assemble with the attached accessories. Furthermore, all attachments can be easily detached to clean. Just wash them or wipe them with a damp towel.

MULTIPURPOSE & SPACE-SAVING: Besides baskets for diverse purposes, this large dish drying rack comes with 1 cup holder, 1 utensil holder, 1 cutting board holder, 1 knife holder, and 5 utility hooks, effectively meeting your wide range of applications. With a weight-bearing of up to 50 lbs, it also saves your precious countertop space by making full use of the room over the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, probably best not to overload
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to put together. You have the option to place the compartments where you want. Though one down fall is the top rack for the plates is a bit flimsy. I washed two glass plates and put them up to dry and the rack wants to slant downward due to weight. I reviewed the other pictures and videos and didn't notice the problem I have. So im not sure. I highly recommend, its a space saver and modern looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gave me a bunch of space back.
reviews.reviewText: The drying rack is like the superhero of my kitchen – it's seriously a game-changer! I used to have a countertop mess with dishes and stuff everywhere, but this bad boy has turned things around. The adjustable design is dope – fits my sink perfectly, and the stainless steel is legit sturdy. No more rust worries! Plus, since it's over-the-sink, it keeps water from messing up my counter and makes it easy to dry without needing a tray to divert water to the sink. Easy to put together, easy to clean – just what I needed. With all the extra holders and hooks, it's basically the kitchen MVP, saving me space and keeping everything in check. Highly recommend it to anyone tired of kitchen chaos!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. It's convenient for me and it fits almost perfectly.PROS: -under 30 minutes I had this put together.-I love that you can switch up the baskets to your needs and the product is adjustable. This is my favorite part.-it's pretty sturdy I think.-hangs over your sink and you save more counter space.-the price seems somewhat reasonable.-worth it. Just buy it.Also the only con I have: there's a few black plastic pieces that the instructions aren't very clear on where they go. But other than that. Super easy and straight forward. Make sure you have all the pieces before starting.Fast shipping too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: It was super easy to put together. Adjustable so you can fit it to your sink size. Holds dishes after a meal for a family of 4 plus more. Frees up my counter space. I would recommend this to my family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hate countertop dish racks so had an in-sink rack. Not ideal, as I lost half my sink. Decided to try this, thinking it’d be too bulky.I love it. It’s sturdy, holds a lot, looks nice (though I expected it to be stainless in color, it’s actually matte gray, which I prefer). Mine came with a knife rack that’s a little dented / wonky on top, but it doesn’t affect functionality so I don’t mind. It also dries my dishes faster than the in-sink rack because it’s gets more air flow.I’m grateful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid drying rack
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together. I have not had any issues yet with it toppling over. There is plenty of room for dishes and other kitchen tools/items. the adjustable width is also nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and works
reviews.reviewText: Love mine space saver and good pricing you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars saves so much space !
reviews.reviewText: easy to assemble, and saves so much counter space. makes washing dishes easier and less messy when i can place the above the sink, and let the water drip down. holds a good amount of stuff too, doesn’t feel unstable. after a couple of months no rust or any issues.
